rooms.description: Wide entrance with ample natural light and accessible design
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living room
Modern kitchen with smart design and ample workspace; includes wheelchair-accessible counters
Accessible guest bathroom with grab bars and sufficient maneuvering space

openings.description: Large entrance door with ramp for wheelchair accessibility
Double car garage door connecting to the two-car garage area
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing abundant natural light and ventilation

special_features.location: North-West Corner of the Ground Floor
special_features.description: Modern swimming pool integrated into the design for recreation and relaxation
Smooth ramps with gentle incline to facilitate wheelchair access

vastu_considerations.entrance_alignment: South facing entrance aligned with positive energy
vastu_considerations.room_orientation: Living and dining areas positioned in the eastern part for morning sunlight
vastu_considerations.water_features: Swimming pool located in north-west corner, mindful of local Vastu guidelines

garage.description: Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor layout with direct access to the living area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and floor-to-ceiling windows for privacy
Two bedrooms designed for children with ample natural light
Shared bathroom accessible to multiple rooms on the first floor

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample ventilation and privacy

vastu_considerations.bedroom_orientation: Bedrooms oriented east to harness morning sunlight
vastu_considerations.privacy: Master Bedroom features privacy with limited openings on adjacent walls
